bug.author: robertnishihara
bug.summary: dashboard.py is not packaged in the Linux Ray wheels.
bug.description: See the conversation in <denchmark-link:https://groups.google.com/forum/?utm_medium=email&utm_source=footer#!msg/ray-dev/M8wGAdEhkTw/QIbvbuoJBAAJ>https://groups.google.com/forum/?utm_medium=email&utm_source=footer#!msg/ray-dev/M8wGAdEhkTw/QIbvbuoJBAAJ</denchmark-link> . I think we can fix this just by putting __init__.py in the ray/python/dashboard directory, though we have to make sure that that includes the html and javascript files. cc <denchmark-link:https://github.com/virtualluke>@virtualluke</denchmark-link>
